sentences.en: 'We have seen nothing else,'returned The Vengeance.

sentences.en: " No; nor will she miss now, " cries The Vengeance, petulantly.
sentences.cn: “ 不会的, 现在也不会错过, ” 复仇女神气冲冲地说.

sentences.en: Ay ! Louder , Vengeance, much louder, and still she will scarcely hear thee.
sentences.cn: 是的,声音大一点, 复仇女神.声音很大了, 可她仍然没听见.

sentences.en: December has turned cold with a vengeance.

sentences.en: I bide my time and the hour of vengeance is nigh.

sentences.en: I pushed the car with a vengeance.
